contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=August 2011}} {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Oga |JapaneseName= 男鹿市 |settlement_type= [[Cities of Japan|City]] |MapImage= Oga in Akita Prefecture Ja.svg |Region= [[Tōhoku region|Tōhoku]] |Prefecture= [[Akita Prefecture|Akita]] |District= |Area_km2= 240.80 |PopDate= October 1, 2011 |Population= 31,863 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 39 |LatitudeMinutes= 53 |LatitudeSeconds= 12.6 |LongtitudeDegrees= 139 |LongtitudeMinutes= 50 |LongtitudeSeconds= 51.3 |Tree= [[Cryptomeria]] |Flower= [[Camellia]] |Bird= [[Grey Heron]] |SymbolImage= Symbol of Oga, Akita.svg |SymbolDescription= |Mayor=Yukio Watanabe (since April 2009) |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= 66-1 Izumidai, Funagawaminato Funagawa, Oga-shi, Akita-ken |CityHallPhone= 0185-23-2111 |CityHallLink= {{URL|www.city.oga.akita.jp}} }} {{nihongo|'''Oga'''|男鹿市|Oga-shi}} is a [[cities of Japan|city]] in [[Akita Prefecture]], Japan. It is located on the [[Oga Peninsula]]. The city was founded on March 31, 1954. As of 2003, the city has an estimated [[population]] of 29,377 and a [[population density]] of 148.34 persons per km². The total area is 198.04 km². On March 22, 2005, the town of [[Wakami, Akita|Wakami]] was merged into the city. As of 2011, the city has an estimated population of 31,863. The total area is 240.80 km². ==Culture== Oga is famous for its Namahage Festival, a traditional event held on New Year's Eve in which groups of men dressed as ogre-like deities called "[[Namahage]]" with masks and straw raincoats visit houses at night.<ref name="jnto_namahage">{{cite web |url= http://www.jnto.go.jp/eng/attractions/event/traditionalevents/a67_fes_oga.html|title= Oga Namahage Festival|work= |publisher= Japan National Tourism Organization|location= Japan|archiveurl= |archivedate= |accessdate= 23 August 2011}}</ref> ==Notable people== *[[Hiromitsu Ochiai]] *[[Shokichi Natsui]] == References == {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{Official website|http://www.city.oga.akita.jp/}} {{ja icon}} * {{Official website|http://www2.city.oga.akita.jp/index_en.html}} {{en icon}} {{Akita}} [[Category:Cities in Akita Prefecture]]
